title: Whispers in the Dark Volume I
description: Carter is feeling a little restless. He loves living with Lucas and Evie in the human world, and he sure isn't bored. Between crossing the Veil to help investigate the Markins and being Evie's self-defense instructor he is definitely a busy guy. No, he isn't bored. He's just... discontent.Meeting Naomi Silver is the answer to all his problems. She's beautiful and fun and she's everything that's been missing in his life. Suddenly Carter is happy and light again. Being in love has a way of doing that to a guy. Of course there are some issues... Naomi is a twenty-five year old human, she's a little needy, and of course he can't tell her the whole truth about himself. So it isn't perfect, but he's determined to make it work.But things are not exactly as they appear. When Naomi finally agrees to meet Lucas and Evie things start to unravel.
author: T.J. Dell
